page.description: The definition of a bubble point.

discussion.p: The bubble point draws the data points as varying sized circles. An additional dimension of "scale" is required in order to draw a bubble point (see *[link:A5.chart Definition Map Object]*). The "scale" dimension will be used to calculate the size of the bubble as a value between the specified "min" and "max" sizes.

The "label" settings applicable to the bubble is "location" and "callout.from". Values of "label.location" can be "none", "callout", "inside" and "outside". Both "inside" and "outside" can have a suffix of "above", "below", "before" or "after" added with a "-". For example "outside-below" will draw the label outside and below the bubble.
Values of "callout.from" can be "center", "top", "left", "right" and "bottom". Each will draw the callout line to the corresponding edge of the bubble.

property.name: size
property.description: The size to map the "scale" dimension to.

property.name: min
property.description: The minimum size of a bubble. The default is "5".

property.name: max
property.description: The maximum size of a bubble. The default is "50".

property.name: line
property.description: The bubble line definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Line Object]*.

property.name: fill
property.description: The bubble fill definition. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Fill Object]*.

property.name: label
property.description: The bubble label. See *[link:A5.chart Definition Label Object]*.

property.name: attrs
property.description: The attributes to add to the bubble element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the attributes.

property.name: tip
property.description: The mouseover tip to add to the bubble element. A function called with "data" (see *[link:A5.chart Render Data Object]*) and "temp" can be used to dynamically calculate the tip.
